rule: The response must start with either "Yes" or "No" based on whether the text contains relevant information to answer the question.
input: evidence: The report details the environmental impact of the new policy including specific CO2 emission reductions. question: Does the text describe the environmental benefits of the new policy?
evaluation:
Yes.
